if(socket.connected){setSocketConnected(true);setMySocketId(socket.id);console.log("‚úÖ Socket already connected:",socket.id);}return()=>{socket.off("connect");socket.off("disconnect");socket.off("connect_error");};},[]);// Listen for partner events

Reconnecting...");setPartnerId(null);console.log("‚ö†Ô∏è Partner disconnected");});// Cleanup on unmount
return()=>{socket.off("waiting");socket.off("paired");socket.off("partner-disconnected");};},[]);// Start chat
